attributes.action: Require All Organisations to Collect and Publish Customer Satisfaction Data
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many organisations (including government departments and many NHS Trusts) have useless Customer Service Departments.  If these organisations were required to collect and publish customer satisfaction data then this would put pressure on them to improve the effectiveness of their Customer Service Departments.  Other ways of improving Customer Service should also be considered.
